title: Oswaldo Henríquez
text:
Oswaldo José Henríquez Bocanegra born in March 10, 1989 in <a href="Santa%20Marta">Santa Marta</a>, <a href="Magdalena%20Department">Magdalena</a>, also known as Oswaldo Henríquez, is a Colombian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>. Henríquez is a product of the <a href="Millonarios">Millonarios</a> youth system and had played with <a href="Millonarios">Millonarios</a> first team since November 2007.
Career.
Millionarios.
Querétano (loan).
On 3 January 2013 Henríquez signed, on loan, with <a href="Liga%20MX">Liga MX</a> club <a href="Quer%C3%A9taro%20F.C.">Querétaro</a>.
Sport Recife.
On 11 January 2016 Henríquez signed a three-year contract with Brazilian club <a href="Sport%20Club%20do%20Recife">Sport Recife</a> on a free transfer.
On 9 July 2018 Henríquez and <a href="Sport%20Club%20do%20Recife">Sport Recife</a> agreed to terminate his contract due to the salary arrears with the player. As this, he became free to sign with another Brazilian club, <a href="CR%20Vasco%20da%20Gama">Vasco da Gama</a>
Vasco da Gama.
On 3 July 2018 <a href="CR%20Vasco%20da%20Gama">Vasco da Gama</a> came to terms with Henríquez to sign him from <a href="Sport%20Club%20do%20Recife">Sport Recife</a>. Few days later, on 15 July, both club and player signed officially.
Bnei Sakhnin.
On 18 August 2020 signed in the <a href="Israeli%20Premier%20League">Israeli Premier League</a> club <a href="Bnei%20Sakhnin%20F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a>.
